description: folded aluminum bank; green top, foot and front border; frogs on a dock, singing and jumping into the water, decorate sides and back; sliding frog on a ladder operates a disc at the top of the ladder, pulling the frog down and locking it place, pulls out a disc; a release LRC send the frog up the ladder and retract the disc with coin; key taped to bottom
inscription:
Inscription

along front bottom edge, in black: [MADE IN WESTERN GERMANY D.B.G.M.]
title: "Frogs at Play" mechanical bank
